author: Rebecca Falconer
title: Capitol rioter who led mob to Speaker's Lobby sentenced to prison
content:
A U.S. Capitol rioter was sentenced to 75 days in prison on Thursday for directing a mob toward the Speaker's Lobby on January 6, 2021.
